text: Born to Be Wild is a 1995 American family adventure comedy movie directed by John Gray and starring Wil Horneff, Helen Shaver, John C. McGinley, Peter Boyle, Gregory Itzin, Alan Ruck, Obba Babatund√©, Janet Carroll. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1995 adventure movies Category:1995 comedy movies Category:1990s family movies Category:American family movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies about gorillas Category:Movies directed by John Gray (director)
title: Born to Be Wild (movie)
